short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify technical text and enhance your reading experience with ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Simplif.ai is a powerful Chrome extension that simplifies technical text into easy-to-understand language. 

Simply highlight the text on any web page and click 'Generate' to create a simplified version that's more accessible and user-friendly. Whether you're conducting research, learning a new skill, or just looking for a more streamlined reading experience, ChatGPT Simplif.ai can help. 

Plus, by downloading this extension, you can take advantage of our affiliate programs, Notion AI. It is the ultimate productivity tool, and they recently integrated AI into their features.

Download ChatGPT Simplify today and start simplifying your reading experience, while also unlocking the power of Notion AI.
